titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the deduction for contributions of food inventory by all corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
10/25/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the special rule allowing a tax deduction for charitable contributions of food inventories by business taxpayers (other than C corporations).
